CNAqc 0.1.0

    • QC analysis via peaks detection

Example CNAqc dataset.

example_dataset_CNAqc.Rd

Example CNAqc dataset.

data(example_dataset_CNAqc)

Format

A list of snvs, cna and purity value that can be used to run CNAqc analyses.

References

??

Examples

data(example_dataset_CNAqc)
